title: Today I Learned...
body: That the Tab Scoreboard shows how many dragons each team has. GG.

replies.body: or just look at the buf bar, where it shows your buffs and debuffs
yeah I do, but when they are in fog of war and I want to see how many drags they have its useful.
Off-topic question: Is your name inspired by Full Metal Alchemist?
you can also use/abuse it to see WHEN they get dragons. check when you think they are doing dragon, and then again when you think they have finished it. and guesstimate the time from that.
thats obviously a new feature with the new dragon buffs. so you need to read patch notes?
